name: Keep E.T. Alive
description:
Hello,

It's my first Ludum Dare Jam ! The theme was ''Keep it alive''.

This game is about an astronaut looking for life far far away from Earth.

To survive during space travel, he needs to use components of water,

whereas water is the cot of life.

Explore different planets, and try to reach one which welcomes life.

StandAlone in Browser : 

https://games.gdevelop-app.com/game-5b9cec8a-c232-41f0-ae6e-f4cd63669df6/index.html

Controls : 

- Arrows to move and to take/give components, or to leave the planet.

- Space to jump.

- Your mouse to click on Start ;)

Tips : in the ship, when you have no more oxygen, or hydrogen on you, keep pressing up arrow, and you transform isotops in oxygen or hydrogen.

PS :

Version 1.1 bug of jump & auto-update of variables in ship

Version 1.2 : bug in procedural creation of new planet.
